trading-crypto-binary.question: Will the price of [Token Pair] open at or above [Value] on [Day of Year], according to TradingView.com "[Market Source]"?

trading-crypto-binary.replaceable: Will the price of [pair] open at or above [price] on [startDate], according to TradingView.com "[source]"?

trading-crypto-binary.example: Will the price of BTC/USD exceed 8000 anytime between the open of September 1, 2020 and close of December 31, 2020, according to TradingView.com "BTCUSD (crypto - Coinbase)"?
trading-crypto-binary.replaceable: Will the price of [pair], exceed [price] anytime between the open of [startDate] and close of [endDate], according to TradingView.com "[source]"?
